Calls may not be empty: [^].

Calls cannot contain whitespace only: [^ ].

Calls cannot contain whitespace at all: [^ ], [^	], [^
].

Calls can contain other characters, such as numbers [^1234567890], or [^^]
even another caret.

[^]: empty

[^ ]: space

[^	]: tab

[^

]: line feed

[^1234567890]: numbers

[^^]: caret
